== '''Verification of Hirlam-7.3''' ==

[[Center(end)]]

== Introduction ==
This page collects Web-links and verification information about reference Hirlam-7.3 before and after its release on Nov 2 2010.

== Verification from Operational 7-3 ==
=== FMI-RCR ===
 * [http://fminwp.fmi.fi/WebgraF/FMI-HIRLAM/ FMI real-time observation verification comparing RCR (7.3 after Nov 2010) vs MB71 (hirlam-7.1 at 7 km resolution)]
 * [http://fminwp.fmi.fi/WebgraF/FMI-HARMONIE/ FMI real-time observation verification comparing RCR (7.3 after Nov 2010), MB71 (hirlam-7.1 at 7 km resolution) vs HARMONIE-AROME (aro35h1)]
 * [http://fminwp.fmi.fi/verif/LTVerifIndex.html Multi-year time series of obervation verification for EWGLAM-stationlist with FMI-HIRLAM] 
=== DMI-S03 ===
 * [https://hirlam.org/portal/oprint/WebgraF/ObsVer/DMI/index.html?choice_ind=Surface choose M09-F03, which shows comparison between DMI M09 (~hirlam-7.1) and DMI S03 (F03, 65 level, based on Hirlam-7.3), ]
=== Muilti-operational model observation verification intercomparison ===
 * [https://hirlam.org/portal/oprint/WebgraF/ObsVer/InterComp/index.html?choice_ind=Surface Multi-model ointercomparison as shown in the data portal]

== Post-release sensitivity experiments ==
 * On ecgate (hirlam-7.2 (RCR) refers to the FMI-RCR as run at FMI)
   * Resolution and domain size impact
     * [https://hirlam.org/portal/validation/36h1/RCR_RCR_D71_RCR_C22_RCR_E11 Hirlam-7.2 (RCR) vs Hirlam-7.3 on RCR (RCR_D71), SMHI-C22 (RCR_C22, C22 domain with 22 km resolution, 40 level) and SMHI-E11 (RCR_E11, 11 km resolution, 60 level, Scandinavia domain), 200910-201001]
     * [https://hirlam.org/portal/validation/36h1/RCR_RCR_D71_RCR_E11 RCR-7.2, RCR-7.3 (RCR_D71) vs SMHI-E11 (11 km resolution, Scandinavia domain), 200910-201001]
     * [https://hirlam.org/portal/validation/36h1/RCR_RCR_D71_RCR_D74 RCR-7.2, RCR-7.3 (RCR_D71) vs RCR-7.3 on RCR-7.4 domain (7 km, 65 level), 200910-201001]
   * sensitivity of large scale mixing scheme
     * [https://hirlam.org/portal/validation/36h1/RCR_RCR_D71_D71noLS Hirlam-7.2 (RCR) vs RCR-7.3 (RCR_D71) vs RCR-7.3 without LSMIX (D71noLS), 200912-201001]
   * sensitivity of 4DVAR vs 3DVAR
     * [https://hirlam.org/portal/validation/36h1/RCR_RCR_D71_D713DVAR Hirlam-7.2 (RCR) vs RCR-7.3 (RCR_D71) vs RCR-7.3 with 3DVAR (D713DVAR), 200912-201001]
   * impact of ATOVS data 
     * [https://hirlam.org/portal/validation/36h1/RCR_RCR_D71_D71noSAT Hirlam-7.2 (RCR) vs RCR-7.3 (RCR_D71) vs RCR-7.3 without satellite data(D71noSAT), 200912. Note only very little satellite data is used in standard runs for the episode anyway (AMSU-A data from NOAA 16/18)]
   * Evolution from 7.3-beta2 to 7.3 
     * [https://hirlam.org/portal/validation/36h1/RCR_RCR_D71_RCR_D71_beta2 Hirlam-7.2 (RCR) vs RCR-7.3 (RCR_D71) vs RCR-7.3 beta2, 200912-201001]
   * Comparison of 7.2.2 on ecgate vs FMI-RCR 
     * [https://hirlam.org/portal/validation/36h1/RCR_722_201012 Hirlam-7.2.2 as run on ecgate vs FMI-RCR-7.3 for 201012]
     * [https://hirlam.org/portal/validation/36h1/RCR_722_200912 Hirlam-7.2.2 as run on ecgate vs FMI-RCR-7.2.1 for 200912]
   * Comparison of 7.3 vs 7.4alpha 
     * [https://hirlam.org/portal/validation/36h1/RCR_74T_RCR_T3_RCR, Hirlam-7.4alpha on RCR-7.4 domain (7 km, 65 level) vs Hirlam-7.3 RCR on ecgate(RCR_T3), Hirlam-7.3 RCR at FMI(RCR), 20101201-20100215]
     * [https://hirlam.org/portal/validation/36h1/RCR_74T_RCR_201102, Hirlam-7.4alpha on RCR-7.4 domain (7 km, 65 level) vs Hirlam-7.3 RCR, 200910-201001]
